2.name: hide.bs.popover
2.description: This event is fired immediately when the hide instance method has been called.

3.name: hidden.bs.popover
3.description: This event is fired when the popover has finished being hidden from the user (will wait for CSS transitions to complete).

4.name: inserted.bs.popover
4.description: This event is fired after the show.bs.popover event when the popover template has been added to the DOM.

5.name: show.bs.popover
5.description: This event fires immediately when the show instance method is called.

6.name: shown.bs.popover
6.description: This event is fired when the popover has been made visible to the user (will wait for CSS transitions to complete).
